bug.author: ActiveChooN
bug.summary: Failed to create task with labels with same names
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
Create task with labels with same name failed but there is still task with no data and one of the similar labels . <denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
Meaningful error message <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
Task creation request failed but task was created with one of the similar labels and no data. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8168727/89895183-07510c80-dbe4-11ea-8d02-c125f1eceda8.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Possible Solution</denchmark-h>
Restrict task creation with same labels on server and add validator in UI. <denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
Create task with labels with same name Go to tasks page and show tasks with no data
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8168727/89894403-b2f95d00-dbe2-11ea-98a3-9698cba53543.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Context</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Git hash commit (git log -1): 2c66102 Docker version docker version (e.g. Docker 17.0.05): no docker Are you using Docker Swarm or Kubernetes? no Operating System and version (e.g. Linux, Windows, MacOS): Ubuntu 20.04 Code example or link to GitHub repo or gist to reproduce problem: Other diagnostic information / logs:
Logs from `cvat` container
<denchmark-h:h3>Next steps</denchmark-h>
You may <denchmark-link:https://gitter.im/opencv-cvat/public>join our Gitter</denchmark-link> channel for community support.
